dialogue.text: Ah, I’m so glad you made it! I was worried that the road here from the dock would’ve gotten you lost.
I took a plane here instead. Beats those boat rides by a longshot.
You look wonderful, too. I’ve never seen you wear something so formal.
This is a special event in your hometown, yeah? I gotta look clean as hell so we can match. Good thing my dad’s got this nice spare suit.
Though if there’s anyone lookin’ wonderful right now, it’s you.
Ahaha, you flatter me, Sour. Are you ready to head inside?
Sure am! I forgot to ask, but kind of event is this, by the way?
Ah, Sweet! I’m so glad you could make it!
Oh, and you must be Sour! Sweet’s been telling me so much about you!
The music you two perform together is simply divine! Oh, it really is an honor to have you with us tonight!
Uh-
Quickly, now! The stage is all set! We’re bound to have an absolutely lovely turnout at the open mic tonight!
Right! I’m ready when you are!
Hey, Sweet-
Yes, Sour?
Why is everyone else here… dead?
They’re a lively bunch who visit from time to time.
This place used to be a music bar my dad would perform at when he was younger, but it had been abandoned so many years ago.
But the spirits here will come every few months and bring its life back with lovely music!
To have the daughter of someone who brought this place so many melodic memories with us today is an honor. I cannot thank you enough for joining us.
Man... life has gotten so much stranger since we’ve met.
Alright, I’ll vibe with some ghosts, as long as I ain’t getting spooked.
